about_the_game:
Set in the heart of the Middle Ages, Who Do Voodoo is a social deduction game that immerses players in a world of intrigue, deception, and loyalty. Players are divided into two secret factions—Loyalists and Traitors—each with hidden motives. The Loyalists are sworn to protect the kingdom, while the Traitors secretly conspire to bring it down. As the game unfolds, players must navigate a world filled with distrust, unraveling the truth about who is friend and who is foe.

Played with 5-16 players, Who Do Voodoo combines both cooperative and PvP elements in a dynamic online multiplayer experience. Players can work together to complete tasks essential to the kingdom’s survival, but hidden Traitors work against them, sabotaging efforts at every turn. With Neutral roles added into the mix, some players aim for a solo victory with their own unique objectives, making every round unpredictable.

Inspired by the rich art and craftsmanship of medieval times, Who Do Voodoo transports players into a world of period-accurate costumes, grand stone castles, and candlelit chambers, where every decision matters. With multiple maps to explore, the game offers new environments and challenges with each session, demanding sharp observation, persuasive skills, and clever alliances to succeed.

Will you solve the mysteries as a Loyalist, create chaos as a Traitor, or pursue your own agenda as a Neutral? In Who Do Voodoo, no one can be fully trusted, and only the most strategic players will win in this thrilling medieval setting.

Key Features:

  • 5-16 Players: Enjoy intense multiplayer sessions with a mix of friends or online players.

  • Loyalist Roles: Take on the role of the Monarch, Knight, Blacksmith, Gladiator, Physician, Noble, and more, working together to protect the kingdom and complete essential tasks.

  • Traitor Roles: Sabotage the kingdom as the Executioner, Maid, Marksman, Necromancer, Poisoner, Possessive, and other devious roles, all while keeping your true intentions hidden.

  • Neutral Roles: Play your own game with unique win conditions as the Morbid, Jester, Troll, Werewolf, Goblin, and more, aiming for a solo victory.

  • Multiple Maps: Explore a variety of medieval settings, each filled with challenges, secrets, and opportunities for strategic gameplay.

  • Cooperative and PvP Elements: Work together or against each other, depending on your hidden role, in a thrilling blend of teamwork and deception.

  • Built-in Voice and Text Chat: Communicate easily with other players during intense rounds.

  • Proximity Chat: Hear other players only when they're near you, adding a layer of immersion and strategy.

  • Intricate Medieval Atmosphere: Dive into a richly detailed world with period-inspired costumes, architecture, and environments that bring the Middle Ages to life.

  • Dynamic Tasks and Sabotages: Complete a variety of tasks to help your faction or sabotage the efforts of others to create chaos.

  • Role-Specific Abilities: Each role has unique abilities that can be used to gain an advantage or deceive others, making every game round feel fresh and strategic.

  • Customizable Game Settings: Adjust game settings such as task difficulty, round duration, and traitor numbers for tailored gameplay experiences.

  • Replayability: With randomized roles and varied maps, each playthrough offers new challenges and strategies, ensuring no two games are the same.

  • Vivid Visual Effects: Enjoy spellbinding visual effects for magic and rituals that enhance the voodoo atmosphere and make each encounter feel magical.

  • In-Game Voting System: When suspicions arise, players can cast votes to decide who they think the traitor is, leading to tense moments of decision-making.

  • Progression and Unlockables: Unlock new roles, skins, and cosmetics as you level up and complete objectives across multiple game sessions.

  • Cross-Platform Play: Engage with players on different platforms, ensuring a broader multiplayer experience.

  • Post-Game Recap: Analyze each game’s events, revealing who the traitors were, who was betrayed, and how strategies unfolded.

short_description: Voodoo binds us, but betrayal breaks us. Work together to complete tasks in this social deduction game, but beware—hidden traitors lurk among you, ready to sabotage and eliminate the others. Uncover the traitors or deceive your way to victory before it's too late. Trust no one!
